snippet: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell's power to freely punish Adrian Peterson has prevailed, two seasons after the Minnesota running back became embroiled in a child-abuse case that heightened the dispute over league discipline....
lead_paragraph: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell's power to freely punish Adrian Peterson has prevailed, two seasons after the Minnesota running back became embroiled in a child-abuse case that heightened the dispute over league discipline.

headline.main: Appeals Court Upholds Adrian Peterson Suspension in '14 Case
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Upholds Adrian Peterson Suspension in '14 Case
